form.SN:
v ameriški angleščini pišemo
marveling
in
marveled
.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
marvels at something
, ga tisto preseneča in navdušuje.

seg.quote: Early travellers marvelled at the riches of Mali.
We marvelled that so much could happen in such a short time.

sense.def:
A marvel
je nekaj, čemur se močno čudimo ali kar občudujemo.

seg.quote: Paestum is one of the marvels of Greek architecture.
It's a marvel that I'm still alive.
